H0.text: Smoky, Leaf-nosed and Vesper are all species of which creature. Mouse

H1.text: Smoky, Leaf-nosed and Vesper are all species of which creature. Squirrel

H2.text: Smoky, Leaf-nosed and Vesper are all species of which creature. Rabbit

H3.text: Smoky, Leaf-nosed and Vesper are all species of which creature. Bat

A4.text: In 1758, Carl Linnaeus classified the seven bat species he knew of in the genus Vespertilio in the order Primates.
